name: kawaii-fivetheme-icons
description: Kawaii FiveM Phone Theme Icons - 36 SVG icons with viewer

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html css js icons dist/ || (mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y index.html dist && xcopy /E /I /Y css dist\css && xcopy /E /I /Y js dist\js && xcopy /E /I /Y icons dist\icons)

author: Theme Designer
